desc: Well-made, versatile clothing that blended style with function. LANIVATTI creates clothing that is versatile in design with fabrics that are as durable and comfortable as they are good for the earth.

layout.text: The long awaited second capsule collection from Lanivatti. The result of pushing new cuts and trying out unique materials. Fabrics are crafted into styles offering versatility and longevity, while staying true to our principles of design: long-lasting quality plus thought-out functionality
